pr_title: HBASE-24024 : Reject multi() requests with rows higher than threshold

timeline.message: HBASE-24024 : Reject multi() requests with rows higher than threshold

timeline.bodyText:
Some improvements is needed here.
Client/Admin, if he/she is not a developer or like else, doesn't know what is multi() request. So, here we could be more clear and informative. (In fact, it's just a batch of Puts/Deletes)
